name: Jop Briët
content: Jop Briet Jop Briët I am a senior researcher in the Algorithms and Complexity group at CWI and am part of the Networks center and QuSoft. Contact Information Address: Phone: E-mail: Centrum Wiskunde & Informatica (CWI) Science Park 123 1098 XG Amsterdam The Netherlands +31 (0)20 5924193 j dot briet at cwi dot nl Teaching Special topics in quantum computing (Fall 2025) Additive combinatorics (Spring 2026) Publications Clifford testing: algorithms and lower bounds (arXiv) Marcel Hinsche, Zongbo Bao, Philippe van Dordrecht, Jens Eisert Jop Briët and Jonas Helsen preprint A near-optimal quadratic Goldreich-Levin algorithm (arXiv) Jop Briët and Davi Castro Silva SODA 2026 On the resolution of Marton's conjecture from additive combinatorics (PDF) Jop Briët Nieuw Archief voor Wiskunde Discreteness of asymptotic tensor ranks (arXiv) Jop Briët, Matthias Christandl, Itai Leigh, Amir Shpilka and Jeroen Zuiddam Discrete Analysis.
